entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this evening then changing to rain before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
